Title: A Monster in Paris
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Music, Romance
Writer: Bibo Bergeron (screenplay), Bibo Bergeron (story), Stéphane Kazandjian (screenplay)
Actors: Matthieu Chedid, Vanessa Paradis, Gad Elmaleh, François Cluzet
Plot: A 3D-animated movie set in Paris in the year 1910 and centered on a monster who lives in a garden and his love for a beautiful, young singer.
